_header: Every man delighteth highly in his degree
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: A prayer to the Virgin Mary — five stanzas rhyme royal

Bod939.First Lines:
[E]Uery man delytyth hyli in hus degreHym for to stand in hys
                    ladyys grace…
Bod939.Last Lines:
…I yow besech in euery heuynesseMe for to helppe & in
                    euery distresse
Bod939.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 76-7.
